name: app-article-server
description: The server side renderer for app-article

scripts.build: yarn build-user && yarn clean && yarn install && parcel build src/index.html --no-cache --public-url ./ && cp src/xd_receiver.html ./dist && cp src/ads.txt ./dist
scripts.build-server: parcel build src/browser/index.html -d dist/client --no-cache --public-url /dist && parcel build src/server/index.js -d dist/server --public-url /dist --target=node --bundle-node-modules
